title: Modern Downtown Austin Stay near Texas Capitol with Rooftop Pool & Daily US$25 Dining Credit
description:
Nestled in Austin’s vibrant Red River Cultural District, this lively hotel is the perfect base for immersing yourself in the city’s music scene and rich cultural atmosphere. Just minutes from the Texas Capitol, University of Texas and energetic 6th Street, you'll be at the centre of Austin’s eclectic attractions and nightlife. 

Unwind and enjoy breathtaking downtown views at the Skyline Rooftop Bar, where refreshing cocktails and light bites create the perfect atmosphere for a memorable evening. Take a dip in the outdoor rooftop pool, then head to Urban Pour Social, where Austin’s unique vibe comes to life with tantalising dishes.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Austin Downtown - University, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 810 Red River Street, Austin, Texas 78701, United States

title: Ultra-Cool Austin Boutique Hotel with Rooftop Pool, Restaurant, Bar & Live Music
description: Experience boutique Austin-cool with a stay at Hotel Van Zandt, a haven of Southern charm. Located in the heart of the city's Rainey Street District, the hotel is a stone's throw from an eclectic mix of bungalow-style bars, food trucks and live music venues. Savour modern Texan cuisine and smooth jazz at the onsite Geraldine's restaurant, enjoy live music and craft cocktails at the poolside bar, or explore the nearby Lady Bird Lake before retreating to your cosy modern accommodation.
offer_address: 605 Davis Street, Austin, Texas 78701, United States

title: Award-Winning Golfers Paradise in Austin Hill Country with Four Championship Courses, Nine Restaurants & Spa
description:
Treat the family to an elegant retreat in the scenic Hill Country of Austin. This resort is a golf lover's paradise, boasting four championship golf courses over an expansive 4,000 acres, earning the resort a wealth of accolades for the sport.

Indulge in the finest Texas-inspired cuisine at the nine onsite restaurants and bars, plunge into three pools and a hot tub, or rejuvenate at the world-class Mokara Spa. For adventure seekers, the nearby Barton Creek Habitat Preserve offers miles of hiking trails through unspoiled wilderness.
offer_address: 8212 Barton Club Drive, Austin, Texas 78735, USA

vendor_name: The Loren at Lady Bird Lake
title: Ultra-Modern Austin City Escape with Rooftop Pool & Day Spa
description: Become mystified by the sheer beauty on display at The Loren at Lady Bird Lake, where breathtaking water vistas, lush parklands and Austin's iconic skyline converge. Nestled at the nexus of convenience and tranquillity, this haven beckons both experienced travellers and locals to indulge in a realm of refined opulence and curated Austin essence. Bask in fantastic panoramic views and watch the city and the water sparkle in front of your eyes as you float within the rooftop pool, sipping away on your favourite drink.
location_description: The Loren at Lady Bird Lake
offer_address: 1211 W. Riverside Drive, Austin 78704, Texas, USA

title: Charming Austin Mansion Retreat Overlooking Wilderness Preserve w. Restaurants, Day Spa & Pool
description: Retreat to a haven among the trees with a stay at Hotel Viata, an mansion-style hotel overlooking Austin’s lush Wild Basin Wilderness Preserve. Just a short drive from Austin’s city centre, the hotel is a serene haven, offering moments of peace and quiet surrounded by the forest. Toast to a refreshing happy hour, indulge in delectable Italy-meets-Texas fare at Laurel Restaurant and elevate your relaxation levels with a Spa Viata treatment - from Himalayan stone massages to brightening facials.
offer_address: 320 S Capital of Texas Highway Building B, West Lake Hills, Austin, Texas 78746, United States
